Package com.bytedesk.core.email

Class EmailListenerConfig

java.lang.Object
com.bytedesk.core.email.EmailListenerConfig
@Component @ConfigurationProperties(prefix="bytedesk.email.listener") public class EmailListenerConfig extends Object
邮件监听配置 用于管理不同协议的监听策略
